string.name: first30UC
string.i:
You can redeem only once in day.
 You can redeem 30UC free of cost. 
 Your redeem UC will be effected in your Account 
 within 24hrs of Working Day. T*C Apply.

string.name: second300UC
string.i:
You can redeem only once in day.
 You have choosen 300UC for redemption charge 
 of 50rs. will be applied.
 Your redeem UC will be effected in your Account 
 within 24hrs of Working Day. T*C Apply.

string.name: third600UC
string.i:
You can redeem only once in day.
 You have choosen 600UC for redemption charge 
 of 100rs will be applied. Your redeem UC will be effected in your Account 
 within 24hrs of Working Day. T*C Appl.
